methods.name: private static CopyOption[] convertMoveToCopyOptions(CopyOption... options) throws AtomicMoveNotSupportedException
methods.comment:
* Converts the given array of options for moving a file to options suitable
     * for copying the file when a move is implemented as copy + delete.

methods.name: static void copyToForeignTarget(Path source, Path target, CopyOption... options) throws IOException
methods.comment:
* Simple copy for use when source and target are associated with different
     * providers

methods.name: static void moveToForeignTarget(Path source, Path target, CopyOption... options) throws IOException
methods.comment:
* Simple move implements as copy+delete for use when source and target are
     * associated with different providers

methodNames: private static CopyOption[] convertMoveToCopyOptions(CopyOption... options) throws AtomicMoveNotSupportedException
